references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are central to the current paper's research.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of diffusion models, which is relevant to the current paper's investigation of inference-time scaling behavior.

This paper introduces classifier-free guidance, a technique used in many diffusion models that improves the quality of generated images, which is directly relevant to the current paper's focus on improving image generation quality.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that aligns image and text features, which is used as a verifier in the current paper's evaluation of inference-time scaling.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art text-to-image diffusion model, which is used in the current paper's experiments on large-scale text-conditioned image generation.
